studio_distributor: Lionsgate, about:blank, Vertigo Entertainment, Media Capital Technologies

title: The Roses
studio_distributor: Searchlight Pictures, South of the River Pictures, SunnyMarch, Delirious Media
overview: Life seems easy for picture-perfect couple Ivy and Theo: successful careers, a loving marriage, great kids. title: xXx
overview: Xander Cage is your standard adrenaline junkie with no fear and a lousy attitude. When the US Government "recruits" him to go on a mission, he's not exactly thrilled.
